project_name.justification: The text states: 'Ridgeline Minerals Corp. (TSXV: RDG) (OTCQB: RDGMF) (FSE: 0GC0) ("Ridgeline" or the "Company") is pleased to announce the staking of the Big Blue Project, ("Big Blue" or the "Project") a high-grade porphyry copper ("Cu") - gold ("Au") - silver ("Ag") exploration prospect in Elko County, Nevada.'

company_name.justification: The acquiring company is identified as 'Ridgeline Minerals Corp. (TSXV: RDG) (OTCQB: RDGMF) (FSE: 0GC0) ("Ridgeline" or the "Company")'.

ceo_buyer.justification: The CEO is identified in the signature block: '"Chad Peters" President & CEO'.

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The text states: 'The Project is 100% owned by the Company and retains no underlying lease payments, work commitments or royalty obligations.'

primary_commodity.justification: The project is described as a 'high-grade porphyry copper ("Cu") - gold ("Au") - silver ("Ag") exploration prospect'. Copper is listed first.

verified_article_link.justification: The article is about the staking of the Big Blue project by Ridgeline Minerals. The source link is provided at the end of the first article: 'To view the source version of this press release, please visit https://www.newsfilecorp.com/release/154212'.

currency.justification: The acquiring company, Ridgeline Minerals Corp., is listed on the TSX Venture Exchange (TSXV), which is a Canadian exchange, implying Canadian Dollars (CAD). 'Ridgeline Minerals Corp. (TSXV: RDG)' and 'Exchange: TSXV'.

cash_payments_raw.justification: The transaction was an acquisition via staking, not a purchase for cash or shares. The text states: 'The Company acquired Big Blue via low-cost staking of 361 lode claims...'

share_payments_raw.justification: The transaction was an acquisition via staking, not a purchase for cash or shares. The text states: 'The Company acquired Big Blue via low-cost staking of 361 lode claims...'

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: The transaction was an acquisition via staking, not a purchase for cash or shares. The text states: 'The Company acquired Big Blue via low-cost staking of 361 lode claims...'

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: No shares were issued as part of the transaction, which was conducted via staking. The text states: 'The Company acquired Big Blue via low-cost staking...'

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: No share warrants were mentioned as part of the transaction.

option_payments_raw.justification: No options were mentioned as part of the transaction.

issued_share_price.justification: No shares were issued as part of the transaction, so there is no issue price.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The text does not mention any exploration commitment in terms of meters. It explicitly states there are no work commitments: '...retains no underlying lease payments, work commitments or royalty obligations.'

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The text explicitly states there are no work commitments as part of the acquisition: 'The Project is 100% owned by the Company and retains no underlying lease payments, work commitments or royalty obligations.'

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: The text explicitly states there are no royalty obligations associated with the project acquisition: 'The Project is 100% owned by the Company and retains no underlying lease payments, work commitments or royalty obligations.'

coverage_area_raw.justification: The second article provides an updated total area for the project after an expansion: 'Big Blue now comprises 502 contiguous lode claims totaling 10,168 acres or 41 square kilometers ("km").'

coverage_area_unit.justification: The unit for the coverage area is specified in the second article: 'Big Blue now comprises 502 contiguous lode claims totaling 10,168 acres or 41 square kilometers ("km").'

resource_size.justification: The text mentions historical production ('produced 94,434 pounds of copper') and rock chip sample results, but does not provide a current mineral resource estimate. Therefore, this field is null.

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The company's ticker and exchange are provided in the first sentence of the press release: 'Ridgeline Minerals Corp. (TSXV: RDG) (OTCQB: RDGMF) (FSE: 0GC0)'.
